name: Divine D.I.V.A. (Script)
detailed_description:
The story, at the beginning for the paths/branches, was made in Twine before the transfer to Ren’py.

This DLC offer you a PDF file for the story script, Twine version, in FRENCH ONLY.
about_the_game:
The story, at the beginning for the paths/branches, was made in Twine before the transfer to Ren’py.

This DLC offer you a PDF file for the story script, Twine version, in FRENCH ONLY.
short_description: The story, at the beginning for the paths/branches, was made in Twine before the transfer to Ren’py. This DLC offer you a PDF file for the story script, Twine version, in FRENCH ONLY.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86 or compatible
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Some strong language.
Also there is a mention of sexual assault.
